course_description: Explores the development and performance of multi-national enterprises in global economic, political, and cultural environments. Topics include the design and control processes of MNE's, the role of transnational institutions, political risk assessment, technology transfers, and management of a multicultural workforce.
prerequisites: OAM 330 or SPECSTUBUS students or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 6689, Section #: 1109, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: J. Lowy, Status: Open
